attributes.action: stop people from creating a fuss over nothing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
are you (the shop owners of britain) not sick of people always complaining about defective products that arnt your fault, well this is the petition for you. 

wimps (thos that cause fuss) arent allowed

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
